name: Leyla and Mecnun
overview: Leyla ile Mecnun is a Turkish television comedy series. The show is set in Istanbul, Turkey and premiered in 2011 on TRT. The series is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Mecnun's parents rouse Metin and Sevim at an ungodly hour over engagement matters. But to Mecnun's dismay, the visit quickly unravels.

episodes.name: Düğün
episodes.overview: While Mecnun is head over heels in love, Arda has no intention of letting Leyla go. But there is no limit to what Mecnun will do to win her over.

episodes.name: Halı Saha
episodes.overview: Metin intervenes on his daughter's behalf, but Mecnun is not so easy to bait. After a mix-up with the check, Mecnun bears the burden of proof.

episodes.name: Fidye
episodes.overview: As Mecnun is about to gain Leyla's trust, Erdal Bakkal and the white-bearded grandpa cook up a new product and unwittingly muddle up everything again.

episodes.name: Şöhret
episodes.overview: Mecnun's romantic gestures impress more than just Leyla, who is vexed by his new persona and seeks the white-bearded grandpa's counsel.

episodes.name: Banka
episodes.overview: Karabasan turns up the heat on Metin. After Mecnun and his friends disentangle themselves from a predicament, an accident turns his world upside down.

episodes.name: Rüya
episodes.overview: The white-bearded grandpa guides Mecnun through a series of dreams in which Mecnun puts his own character to the test in hopes of waking Leyla.

episodes.name: Rüya
episodes.overview: Mecnun exhausts all efforts to recover Leyla's memory. The white-bearded grandpa tries to right things via her dreams, but Arda hijacks the plan.

episodes.name: Sihirbaz
episodes.overview: Leyla isolates herself from everyone. Yavuz is tempted by the magician's wand. After a shouting match, Mecnun and Leyla turn a corner.

episodes.name: Dünyanın Sonu
episodes.overview: Iskender runs into an old flame. Leyla and Mecnun are at the peak of their euphoria, but Mecnun must sacrifice to restore the balance of the cosmos.

episodes.name: Çanta
episodes.overview: Mecnun is in a bad state and seeks therapy. Leyla recruits Arda to take revenge against Mecnun, who gets blood on his hands along with his friends.

episodes.name: Cesek
episodes.overview: Metin calls for a competition, and the prize is Leyla. Someone gathers incriminating evidence linking Mecnun and his friends to the homicide.

episodes.name: Fake To The Future
episodes.overview: Kamil makes Mecnun an offer, but darker motives are behind the proposal. Mecnun gets off the train to find himself in another time.

episodes.name: Evler
episodes.overview: Arda's father suggests a contingency plan to split Leyla and Mecnun with a real estate scheme. It's Leyla's turn to make a sacrifice.

episodes.name: Arda'nın Düğünü
episodes.overview: Erdal suspects Mecnun will spoil the deal. Yavuz takes matters into his own hands when Arda and his father decide to speed up the nuptials.

episodes.name: Clone Wars
episodes.overview: Arda and his father hire a mad scientist to clone Mecnun, but the experiment produces unexpected results.

episodes.name: Şekerpaşa
episodes.overview: Ismail falls in love and asks the white-bearded grandpa for help. Zeynep and Yavuz try to patch things up between Leyla and Mecnun.

episodes.name: Arda Kalan
episodes.overview: Iskender founds his own mafia, "Godfather" style. Set on spoiling the peace, Arda's father sends Kamil to wreak havoc in the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Benjamin
episodes.overview: Benjamin creates chaos in the neighborhood and separates Leyla and Mecun, but his vendetta is directed against the white-bearded grandpa.

episodes.name: Hoşçakal
episodes.overview: Benjamin schemes to get rid of Iskender, who regrets challenging Arda's father. The odds are working against Leyla and Mecnun.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Mecnun tries to know himself better. Yavuz learns that Eylul doesn't love him.
